MS.S: Module to manage Hierarchical Configuration Data.

## [0.40.1] - 2023-04-03_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Added_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Added support for specifying the encoding (#87)._x000D__x000A_- Added error handling to 'Get-FileProviderData.ps1'._x000D__x000A_- Added functions for get and clear the Datum RSOP cache._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Fixed how issue not allowing Datum handlers to be used on arrays (#89)._x000D__x000A_- Fixed issue in Merge-Hashtable where it did not merge hashtables correctly when these_x000D__x000A_ are included in an array._x000D__x000A_- Formatting in all files with VSCode formatting according to the 'settings.json' file taken from Sampler_x000D__x000A_- Added yaml format config settings 'singleQuote' and 'bracketSpacing' and reformatted all yaml files according to the new settings._x000D__x000A_- Cleanup_x000D__x000A_ - Get-DatumType.ps1_x000D__x000A_ - Merge-DatumArray.ps1_x000D__x000A_ - Merge-Hashtable.ps1_x000D__x000A_ - Compare-Hashtable.ps1_x000D__x000A_ - Node.ps1_x000D__x000A_ - FileProvider.ps1_x000D__x000A_ - ConvertTo-Datum.ps1_x000D__x000A_ - Get-MergeStrategyFromPath.ps1_x000D__x000A_ - Get-MergeStrategyFromString.ps1_x000D__x000A_ - Get-DatumRsop.ps1_x000D__x000A_ - Merge-Datum.ps1_x000D__x000A_ - datum.psd1_x000D__x000A_ - Get-FileProviderData.ps1_x000D__x000A_ - Invoke-TestHandlerAction.ps1_x000D__x000A_ - New-DatumStructure.ps1_x000D__x000A_ - Resolve-Datum.ps1_x000D__x000A_ - Resolve-DatumPath.ps1_x000D__x000A_ - Test-InvokeCommandFilter_x000D__x000A_ - Resolve-NodeProperty.ps1_x000D__x000A_ - New-DatumFileProvider.ps1_x000D__x000A_- Added 'GitHubConfig' to build.yml and updating main branch to main.
